title: The First Day I Saw Her
content: I still remember the way she laughed that day. Everything around felt quieter, like the world paused just to let me notice her.

title: When She Smiled Again
content: It’s funny how something as simple as her smile can fix my entire day. Maybe that’s what makes her special.

title: Her Birthday Gift
content: I finally gave her the gift. She smiled... maybe just a little. It was enough to make my heart feel calm for the first time in months.
